claim: PlayStation 3 is a console that Portal 2 was released on.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Before the game 's release on Steam , the company released the Potato Sack , a second multi-week alternate reality game , involving 13 independently developed titles which culminated in a distributed computing spoof to release Portal 2 several hours early .

claim: PlayStation 3 is a console that Portal 2 was released on.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Other hardware released as part of the PlayStation series includes the PSX , a digital video recorder which was integrated with the PlayStation and PlayStation 2 , though it was short lived due to its high price and was never released outside Japan , as well as a Sony Bravia television set which has an integrated PlayStation 2 .

claim: PlayStation 3 is a console that Portal 2 was released on.
